column5: I thought it would be nice to recognize the OFC Tournament Bigfish of 2007.  Team 4 "Livin 4 fishin" had the biggest fish in 5 out of 10 categories.  Not surprisingly Team 4 also has the 2007 OFC Tournament all but locked up with 316.75".  Team 7 "BiteMe" had the biggest fish in 2 categories.  Team 6 "Fishing Frenzy", Team 3 "Fin-Chasers" and Team 5 "Up Scalers" each had one big fish category.  Congrats to all the members with bigfish entries.  Here are the BF entries of 2007.....a special congrats to JPD who claims 4 Bigfish for 2007.  Well Done JPD.  32" Catfish caught by Sonny on June 25th    43" King Salmon caught by fishndevil on July 2nd    38" Carp caught by JPD on August 29th    26" Lake Trout caught on Lake Simcoe by JPD on May 29th    34" Great Lake Trout caught by SlowPoke on Sept 8th    50" Musky caught by irishfield in October    38" Pike caught by irishfield on September 28th    22" Largie caught by JPD on June 26th    14.5" Crappie caught by JPD on Lake Simcoe on May 3rd    33.5" Walleye caught by ccmtcanada on Lake Ontario near Durham in October or November       Cheers,  FOTB
all very impressive fish. congrats to JPD to so many big ones and wayne, that looks like a beauty spot to fish! thanks to FOTB for making this post and keeping track   kevin
Wayne has 2 big fish..get out of here....  nice going guys....
That would be correct Joey.  My eyesight is getting worse in my old age.  lol  FOTB

I have to apologize to my team for not having logos and measuring tape for all the fish I caught that could have qualified...sorry team!  Big Chinook   Big Lake Trout   Big Steelhead   Big Brown Trout   Big Coho   Big Freshwater Drum   Carp!   Small Walleye!   There's more too...times when I didn't even have the camera..Pike, Bass, Perch I feel horrible...  Sorry TEAM! Tony
Some very nice fish there folks! congrats to all.  Great job there FOTB. Takes time and effort to do what you did to keep track of it all. Well done!

Thanks for keepin track FOTB!!  Kev.. you talkin about the pike picture? Flyin.. or long hike.. only. Did you miss my flight out of there in my September Temagami post?  And Terry... you should be ashamed !  You know what it costs to pay an underwater diver to "bait" your hook for you?  Tony... put together a post on those beasts. They don't do anything for your team here! LOL

I guess i missed it, Oh well, let me go search it out now!  MAN i miss the summer/open water! commmmonn 2008!   *found it, very cool, i wished i had did the flying scholarship back when i was in cadets ! i think if you took off the audio, it would've saved ALOT of space.. haha.  kevin

Space isn't an issue for me Kev...son has servers all over North America.  5 more days to this Tourney... maybe I should go out and drill a big hole in the Sound and vertical jig a fuzzy duzzit for that big gal I know is out there....  Our Teams pitfall was we have nobody that fishes for them course fish I guess...
well, i meant instead of being 17-18meg files, i'm thinking they would've shrunk to a couple megs only each, just better for the people that have the slower service..... but i was fine..
Thanks for posting that .WTG JPD and Slowpoke my teamates.Team #4 rocks.
nice fish everyone!! I am sorry team 1... had that carp beat by 1 inch
JPD-way to go!! Wayne, jeez, you caught some beauty fish this year!!! Congrats guys!!!
WOW...lots of big fish were caught this year for sure !!!!   congrats to everyone....cheers
Fishinonthebrain thanks for the updates, you did a good job. The pictures look great and congrats to all the winners!
